content.math_content: \begin{array}{l} a _ {n} = 2 \int_ {0} ^ {1} (1 - x) \cos n \pi x d x \\ = 2 \left(\int_ {0} ^ {1} \cos n \pi x d x - \int_ {0} ^ {1} x \cos n \pi x d x\right) \\ = 2 \left(\frac {1}{n \pi} \sin n \pi x \Bigg | _ {0} ^ {1} - \frac {1}{n \pi} \int_ {0} ^ {1} x d \sin n \pi x\right) \\ = - \frac {2}{n \pi} \int_ {0} ^ {1} x d \sin n \pi x \\ = \frac {- 2}{n \pi} \left(x \sin n \pi x \big | _ {0} ^ {1} - \int_ {0} ^ {1} \sin n \pi x d x\right) \\ = \frac {2}{n \pi} \int_ {0} ^ {1} \sin n \pi x d x \\ = \frac {- 2}{n ^ {2} \pi^ {2}} \cos n \pi x | _ {0} ^ {1} \\ = \frac {- 2}{n ^ {2} \pi^ {2}} (\cos n \pi - 1). \\ \end{array}
